name: CaribbeanTelevisionNetwork
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We feature news from every country in the Caribbean region and around the world. Our contents are available for free on Roku, Amazon Fire TV, YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter. We also have several websites featuring articles in different languages to better serve you. 

We have reporters in all of the 10 geographic departments in Haiti reporting in real time to inform you about every event happening in Haiti. We also have reporters in the Dominican Republic, Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Canada, and France. 
At Caribbean Television Network, we prioritize the people who have contributed to the development of Haitian and Caribbean heritage. We strive to tell and present Haiti and the Caribbean from the perspective of Haitians and Caribbean people. 
Caribbean Television Network is a space for meetings, exchanges and debates for all those who wish to make their contribution to building prosperous Caribbean regions to the delight of the Caribbean people.

At the Caribbean Television Network: It's about all of Us!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
